thread.title: BRIEF-Provident Financial Sees CCD FY Pre-Exceptional Loss Of About 120 Mln Pounds

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Provident Financial Sees CCD FY Pre-Exceptional Loss Of About 120 Mln Pounds
text:
Jan 16 (Reuters) - Provident Financial Plc:
* CCD IS EXPECTED TO REPORT A FY PRE-EXCEPTIONAL LOSS OF C.Â£120M WHICH IS AT UPPER END OF GUIDANCE PROVIDED IN AUGUST 2017
* TRADING STATEMENT * VANQUIS BANK AND MONEYBARN HAVE BOTH TRADED SATISFACTORILY THROUGH FINAL QUARTER OF YEAR
* VANQUIS BANK AND MONEYBARN HAVE BOTH COMMENCED DIALOGUE WITH FINANCIAL CONDUCT AUTHORITY (FCA)
* HOME CREDIT BUSINESS IS ANNOUNCING A PROPOSED RATIONALISATION OF ITS CENTRAL SUPPORT FUNCTIONS WHICH IS SUBJECT TO WORKFORCE CONSULTATION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
